summary: Implements a diffusion scheduler tailored for the UnCLIP model, defining the noise schedule, timestep handling, and step logic required to iteratively denoise latent samples during image generation. Includes a data container for scheduler outputs.
business_intent: Enable reliable and configurable sampling for UnCLIP-based generative pipelines, facilitating highâ€‘quality image synthesis by managing the diffusion process and exposing adjustable scheduling parameters.
